welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
[![Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/main/docs/graphic/image.svg)](https://jellyfin-node.greep.fr/#) [![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/jellyfin.png?downloads=true&stars=true)](https://npmjs.org/jellyfin) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/jellyfin?logo=npm)](https://npmjs.com/jellyfin) [![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk?logo=github)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/releases/latest) [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/570024448371982373?label=Discord&logo=discord)](https://greep.fr/#/discord) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dw/jellyfin?logo=npm)](https://npmjs.com/jellyfin) [![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/jellyfin)](LICENSE) [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk?logo=github)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/issues) [![GitHub pull requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk?logo=github)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/pulls) [![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk?logo=github&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/stargazers) [![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/network/members) [![Builds](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/GreepTheSheep/node-jellyfin-sdk/actions/workflows/build.yml)
# Disclaimer - This project is still in Work In Progress (WIP) --- ## Documentation Documentation and examples are available on [this website](https://jellyfin-node.greep.fr/#/docs) --- ## Contributing Please see the [CONTRIBUTING.md file](CONTRIBUTING.md) --- ## Discussion If you want to talk about this project or just for saying hi, Join the [Project's Discord Server](https://greep.fr/#/discord)

contributing.name: Contributing
contributing.content:
# Contributing

Thanks for being part of the code!

## Directory layout

```css
+---.github
¦   +---workflows /* CI & automations for PR and releases */
+---.vscode /* VSCode Debug and tasks file */
+---node_modules /* Node.js modules, for npm i */
+---src
¦   +---client
¦   +---rest /* HTTP Requests */
¦   +---structures
¦   +---util /* Client options and private constructor strings */
+---typings /* TypeScript auto-generated typings for VSCode and other IDE using TS */
+---test /* Mocha tests (coming later) */
```

## Pull Requests

Before opening a PR, run `npm test` to do a eslint scan then run mocha tests

Before commiting, **be sure that no files from the `typings/` directory is commited!** GitHub Actions will build it automatically after pushing

When opening a PR, please open it to the 'develop' branch. Thanks!

## Issues

All issues are appreciated, it can be suggestions, bug fixes.

## Discussion

If you want to talk about this project or just for saying hi, Join the [Greep's Discord Server](https://greep.fr/#/discord).

props.name: options
props.description: The options of the client.

props.name: serverId
props.description: The server identifier

props.name: user
props.description: The connected user of the client.

methods.name: login
methods.description:
Authenticate to the Jellyfin server

<warn>The parameters should be kept private at all times.</warn>
<info>You should use environment variables to keep it private.</info>

<info>When authenticated, a {@link Client#ready} event is fired, you can also use promises like `then()` or `await` if you don't want to use events.</info>

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the user to authenticate

params.name: password
params.description: The password of the user to authenticate

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: The base URL of the Jellyfin server

methods.name: logout
methods.description:
Disconnects from the Jellyfin server

<info>When disconnected, a {@link Client#disconnected} event is fired, you can also use promises like `then()` or `await` if you don't want to use events.</info>

returns.description: A promise that resolves to the API response

methods.name: apiReqArrayBuffer
methods.description: Do an API request to get a binary content.

methods.name: login
methods.description:
Authenticate to the Jellyfin server

<warn>The parameters should be kept private at all times.</warn>
<info>You should use environment variables to keep it private.</info>

<info>When authenticated, a {@link Client#ready} event is fired, you can also use promises like `then()` or `await` if you don't want to use events.</info>

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the user to authenticate

params.name: password
params.description: The password of the user to authenticate

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: The base URL of the Jellyfin server

methods.name: logout
methods.description:
Disconnects from the Jellyfin server

<info>When disconnected, a {@link Client#disconnected} event is fired, you can also use promises like `then()` or `await` if you don't want to use events.</info>

returns.description: A promise that resolves to the API response

methods.name: apiReqArrayBuffer
methods.description: Do an API request to get a binary content.

events.name: ready
events.description: Emitted when the client was authenticated successfully to the Jellyfin server.

events.name: disconnected
events.description: Emitted when the client was disconnected successfully to the Jellyfin server.

events.name: apiRequest
events.description:
Emitted before every API request.
This event can emit several times for the same request, e.g. when hitting a rate limit.
<info>This is an informational event that is emitted quite frequently,
it is highly recommended to check `request.url` to filter the data.</info>

params.name: request
params.description: The request that is about to be sent

events.name: apiResponse
events.description:
Emitted after every API request has received a response.
This event does not necessarily correlate to completion of the request, e.g. when hitting a rate limit.
<info>This is an informational event that is emitted quite frequently,
it is highly recommended to check `request.url` to filter the data.</info>

params.name: request
params.description: The request that triggered this response

params.name: response
params.description: The response received from the API

props.name: client
props.description: The client that instantiated this

methods.name: universalAudio
methods.description:
Gets an universal audio stream.
<info>This is an old method by Jellyfin that works only if you're connected with a token,
It's recommended to use {@link UniversalAudio#stream} instead.</info>

params.name: container
params.description: The container (mp3, flac etc.). If passed, the file will be live converted by the server. Defaults to its original container.

props.name: client
props.description: The client that created this request

methods.name: do
methods.description: Makes a request to the API

methods.name: doArrayBuffer
methods.description: Makes a request to the API and returns an ArrayBuffer

props.name: UserPolicy
props.description: The raw data

props.name: baseUrl
props.description:
The default Jellyfin URL to use. It must contain the protocol. And should contain a subpath (ended with a slash), if there's one.

If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_URL` when instantiating the client

props.name: username
props.description:
The Jellyfin Username to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_USERNAME` when instantiating the client

props.name: password
props.description:
The Jellyfin Password to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_PASSWORD` when instantiating the client

props.name: dev
props.description: Whether is in dev mode (Uses more logging traces in the core).

props.name: clientInfo
props.description: Client Info Options.

props.name: deviceInfo
props.description: Device Info Options.

props.name: defaultOptions
props.description: The base client instance.

classes.name: defaultOptionsClientInfo
classes.description: Represents the client info category in the configuration.

props.name: name
props.description:
The default Client Name to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_CLIENT_NAME` when instantiating the client

props.name: version
props.description:
The default Client Version to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_CLIENT_VERSION` when instantiating the client

props.name: defaultOptionsClientInfo
props.description: Default options.

classes.name: defaultOptionsDeviceInfo
classes.description: Represents the device info category in the configuration.

props.name: name
props.description:
The default Client Name to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_CLIENT_NAME` when instantiating the client,
else this uses "node-jellyfin"

props.name: id
props.description:
The default Device ID to use.
If present, this defaults to `process.env.JELLYFIN_DEVICE_ID` when instantiating the client.
If not, uses the generated UUID used in the postinstall script. If the UUID is not present, it generates a random one.

props.name: defaultOptionsDeviceInfo
props.description: Default options.

classes.name: GetItemsParams
classes.description: The parameters to pass in {@link Client#getItems} method

props.name: maxOfficialRating
props.description: Filter by maximum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

props.name: hasThemeSong
props.description: Filter by items with theme songs.

props.name: hasThemeVideo
props.description: Filter by items with theme videos.

props.name: hasSubtitles
props.description: Filter by items with subtitles.

props.name: hasSpecialFeature
props.description: Filter by items with special features.

props.name: hasTrailer
props.description: Filter by items with trailers.

props.name: adjacentTo
props.description: Return items that are siblings of a supplied item.

props.name: parentIndexNumber
props.description: Filter by parent index number.

props.name: hasParentalRating
props.description: Filter by items that have or do not have a parental rating.

props.name: isHd
props.description: Filter by items that are HD or not.

props.name: is4K
props.description: Filter by items that are 4K or not.

props.name: locationTypes
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on LocationType. This allows multiple.

props.name: excludeLocationTypes
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on LocationType. This allows multiple.

props.name: isMissing
props.description: Filter by items that are missing episodes or not.

props.name: isUnaired
props.description: Filter by items that are unaired episodes or not.

props.name: minCommunityRating
props.description: Filter by minimum community rating.

props.name: minCriticRating
props.description: Filter by minimum critic rating.

props.name: minPremiereDate
props.description: The minimum premiere date. Format must be in ISO.

props.name: minDateLastSaved
props.description: The minimum last saved date. Format must be in ISO.

props.name: minDateLastSavedForUser
props.description: The minimum last saved date for the current user. Format must be in ISO.

props.name: maxPremiereDate
props.description: The maximum premiere date. Format must be in ISO.

props.name: hasOverview
props.description: Filter by items that have an overview or not.

props.name: hasImdbId
props.description: Filter by items that have an IMDb id or not.

props.name: hasTmdbId
props.description: Filter by items that have an TMDb id or not.

props.name: hasTvdbId
props.description: Filter by items that have an TVDb id or not.

props.name: isMovie
props.description: Filter for live tv movies.

props.name: isSeries
props.description: Filter for live tv series.

props.name: isNews
props.description: Filter for live tv news.

props.name: isKids
props.description: Filter for live tv kids.

props.name: isSports
props.description: Filter for live tv sports.

props.name: excludeItemIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered by excluding item ids. This allows multiple.

props.name: startIndex
props.description: The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

props.name: limit
props.description: The maximum number of records to return.

props.name: recursive
props.description: When searching within folders, this determines whether or not the search will be recursive.

props.name: searchTerm
props.description: Filter based on a search term.

props.name: sortOrder
props.description: Sort Order - Ascending, Descending.

props.name: parentId
props.description: The parent item Id (if none, returns the collections)

props.name: fields
props.description: Specify additional fields of information to return in the output. This allows multiple.

props.name: excludeItemTypes
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple.

props.name: includeItemTypes
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple.

props.name: isFavorite
props.description: Filter by items that are marked as favorite, or not.

props.name: mediaTypes
props.description: Filter by MediaType. Allows multiple.

props.name: imageTypes
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on those containing image types. This allows multiple.

props.name: sortBy
props.description: Specify one or more sort orders.

props.name: isPlayed
props.description: Filter by items that are played, or not.

props.name: genres
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on genre. This allows multiple.

props.name: officialRatings
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on OfficialRating. This allows multiple.

props.name: tags
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple.

props.name: years
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on production year. This allows multiple.

props.name: enableUserData
props.description: Include user data.

props.name: imageTypeLimit
props.description: The max number of images to return, per image type.

props.name: enableImageTypes
props.description: The image types to include in the output.

props.name: person
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person.

props.name: personIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person id.

props.name: personTypes
props.description: If specified, along with Person, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person and PersonType. Allows multiple.

props.name: studios
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on studio. This allows multiple.

props.name: artists
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on artists. This allows multiple.

props.name: excludeArtistIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on artist id. This allows multiple.

props.name: artistIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on artist id. This allows multiple.

props.name: albumArtistIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified album artist id.

props.name: contributingArtistIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified contributing artist id.

props.name: albums
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on album. This allows multiple.

props.name: albumIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on album id. This allows multiple.

props.name: ids
props.description: If specific items are needed, specify a list of item id's to retrieve. This allows multiple.

props.name: videoTypes
props.description: Filter by VideoType Allows multiple.

props.name: minOfficialRating
props.description: Filter by minimum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

props.name: isLocked
props.description: Filter by items that are locked.

props.name: isPlaceHolder
props.description: Filter by items that are placeholders.

props.name: hasOfficialRating
props.description: Filter by items that have official ratings.

props.name: collapseBoxSetItems
props.description: Whether or not to hide items behind their boxsets.

props.name: minWidth
props.description: Filter by the minimum width of the item.

props.name: minHeight
props.description: Filter by the minimum height of the item.

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Filter by the maximum width of the item.

props.name: maxHeight
props.description: Filter by the maximum height of the item.

props.name: is3D
props.description: Filter by items that are 3D, or not.

props.name: seriesStatus
props.description: Filter by Series Status. Allows multiple.

props.name: nameStartsWithOrGreater
props.description: Filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

props.name: nameStartsWith
props.description: Filter by items whose name is sorted equally than a given input string.

props.name: nameLessThan
props.description: Filter by items whose name is equally or lesser than a given input string.

props.name: studioIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on studio id. This allows multiple.

props.name: genreIds
props.description: If specified, results will be filtered based on genre id. This allows multiple.

props.name: enableTotalRecordCount
props.description: Enable the total record count.

props.name: enableImages
props.description: Include image information in output.

props.name: GetItemsParams
props.description: The client instance

classes.name: UniversalAudioParams
classes.description: The optional parameters to pass in {@link UniversalAudio#universalAudio} method

props.description: The audio containers.

props.name: mediaSourceId
props.description: The media version id, if playing an alternate version.

props.name: audioCodec
props.description: The audio codec to transcode to.

props.name: maxAudioChannels
props.description: The maximum number of audio channels.

props.name: transcodingAudioChannels
props.description: The number of how many audio channels to transcode to.

props.name: maxStreamingBitrate
props.description: The maximum streaming bitrate.

props.name: audioBitRate
props.description: Specify an audio bitrate to encode to, e.g. 128000. If omitted this will be left to encoder defaults.

props.name: startTimeTicks
props.description: Specify a starting offset, in ticks. 1 tick = 10000 ms.

props.name: transcodingContainer
props.description: The container to transcode to.

props.name: transcodingProtocol
props.description: The transcoding protocol.

props.name: maxAudioSampleRate
props.description: The maximum audio sample rate.

props.name: maxAudioBitDepth
props.description: The maximum audio bit depth.

props.name: enableRemoteMedia
props.description: Whether to enable remote media.

props.name: breakOnNonKeyFrames
props.description: Whether to break on non key frames.

props.name: enableRedirection
props.description: Whether to enable redirection.
